summary: Implements backend services for the Docling V2 parser, handling document validation, page loading, counting, and cleanup, while providing perâ€‘page representations that expose rendered images, dimensions, bitmap regions, detected text cells, and utilities for visualizing layout clusters and extracting text within arbitrary rectangles.
business_intent: Enable reliable PDF document ingestion and structured content extraction for downstream applications such as data mining, OCR pipelines, and automated document analysis.
